settings.title_public_subtitle_community: Everyone can discover or search in-app and global to find this community. The content & activities inside are visible to everyone.

settings.title_private_subtitle_group: All registered users can discover and search in-app to find this group. The content & activities inside are not visible to all users.
settings.title_secret_subtitle_community: All registered users cannot discover and search to find this community. The content & activities inside are not visible to all users.
settings.title_secret_subtitle_group: All registered users cannot discover and search to find this group. The content & activities inside are not visible to all users.
settings.title_open_subtitle_group: All members in the same community can discover and search in-app to find this group. The content & activities inside are visible to all members. For all registered users who are not in the community, the content & activities inside are not visible to them.
